headline: Dow Announces Appointment of Karen S. Carter as Chief Operating Officer
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) today announced that Karen S. Carter, currently president of Dow Packaging & Specialty Plastics, has been appointed to the role of Chief Operating Officer, effective immediately.
